name: The Professor FunnyMan Game
description:
Professor FunnyMan was a character I came up with  for school projects in High School. He's a Professor specialized in History and he maybe somewhat insane.  I decided to make a game about this character for my classmates and some of my friends that went to the school. 

So the plot is that Professor FunnyMan and his Camera Man were going to get their monthly paychecks at Sunnyvale High School, but they have to go on a dangerous journey to find their boss when the office door is locked for some reason. Battle Hostile Teacher bosses and school supplies in order to find Mr. Richardson, in order for Professor FunnyMan to receive his monthly paycheck. 

Also there is a quest and Easter egg to find in game. 

Disclaimer: No teachers where hurt in the making of this game, they were actors.

Controls:

Movement - Arrow keys, Num pad

Action - Z, Enter, Space

Cancel - X, Esc, Num pad 0

Menu - X, Esc, Num pad 0

Run - Shift 

Also you could use your mouse to move around in the game a well.
